content: Set terminal title for Phase 1 implementation
Step 1.1a: Add is_math_type() method to TypeInfo
Build after adding is_math_type() method
Step 1.1b: Update FormatInfo to use MutationPath objects
Step 1.1c: Update EnumVariant to use EnumVariantKind enum
Build after updating type structures
Step 1.1d: Create UnifiedTypeInfo::from_type_info constructor
Build after adding constructor
Step 1.1e: Remove string-based is_math_type() from UnifiedTypeInfo
Step 1.1f: Update call sites for EnumVariant changes
Build and fix compilation errors from type changes
Run clippy after Step 1.1 changes
Step 1.2: Refactor DiscoveryContext::new() to use TypeSchemaEngine
Build after DiscoveryContext refactor
Step 1.3: Remove enrich_with_type_registry() method
Step 1.3: Remove call to enrich_with_type_registry() from orchestrator
Build after removing enrichment methods
Step 1.4a: Remove obsolete discovery methods
Step 1.4b: Remove RegistryPlusExtras from DiscoverySource enum
Step 1.4c: Update DiscoverySource usage to TypeRegistry
Build and fix final compilation errors
Run clippy on entire workspace
Run cargo nextest run for validation
STOP if test failures - review with user
Final code review by subagent
